title: Bug 121682: Exception throws when exporting data from a table containing highlight/map
description:
Description: An exception is thrown when trying to export data from the attached report.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a table that includes a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
2. Preview the attached report.
3. Attempt to export the data from the table.
OB: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from a table containing a group, highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
EB: The exception should not be thrown when exporting data from a table containing a group, highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
SR: To resolve this issue, investigate and fix the exception that is thrown when exporting data from a table containing a group, highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
